description: 20 year old hottie, Carrigan Wade, steps out of the deck on a sunny summer day and after checking both ways to see that he's not being spied on, shows off for the camera, in a slow, sensual scene where he caresses himself. title: CitiBoyz 2: Carrigan & Company, Scene #01
